ygData.subject: Re: Hidden One --- Discovered
ygData.msgSnippet: Havotron turned to Spinister.  He thought for a moment. Spinister, contact SLugslinger and Needlenose, have them attach wires from our ship to the Autobot

Havotron turned to Spinister.  He thought for a moment. "Spinister, 
contact SLugslinger and Needlenose, have them attach wires from our 
ship to the Autobot ship. The cut the engine. No matter where they go 
we will follow.  Nightmare, get all injured and in stasis lock into 
safe compartments. We will need them. Quake, you help Nightmare.

Quake turned and looked at Havotron then Nightmare and spit a drip of 
oil in disgust.

"NOW!!!" Havotron ordered.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Slugslinger also begins to sputter, his engines not roaring anymore.
> "What's going on?" Caliburst asked nervously notting the energy 
meters
> dropping. 
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
--
> 
> Inside Spinister looks around at the stumbling troops, then to 
Havotron
> for Direction.
> 
> Nightmare tries his best not to falter, and stay at his ready 
position
> next to Havotron, like a model soldier. Jagged however stumbles, and
> then trips over Apeface as he lands face first, in stasis lock.
> 
> Apeface also falls over, trying to grab something to stabalize, but
> fails as he falls onto his back, transforming to ape mode, as his 
head
> detaches, and transforms into a little robot, backflipping and 
landing.
> Spasma then turns towards the post Hook left empty. As a scientist 
he
> was over curious at what was happening. He leapt up onto the chair, 
but
> since he couldnt see, he then leapt to the consol, and looked at the
> readings. "Sir, this isn't good, as it is our ship may stall, in
> outerspace." He says in a worried tone.
